build.name: cpucp
build.build_command: make CHIPSET=lanai target_sign_v2_qti_test && make CHIPSET=palawan target_sign_v2_qti_test && make CHIPSET=milos target_sign_v2_qti_test && rm -rf .git*

build.name: cpuss_vm
build.build_command: export PATH=/pkg/qct/software/gnu/make/4.1/bin:$PATH && make SOC_FAMILY=lanai release && make SOC_FAMILY=palawan release && make SOC_FAMILY=milos release && rm -rf .git* README.md

step.params: python @tool_name sectools metabuild-secure-image --vouch-for --image-id QUPV3 AOP SHRM XBL-CONFIG UEFI XBL-RAM-DUMP CPUCP TZ QHEE TZ-DEVCFG MPSS ADSP CDSP CPUCP-DTB AOP-CONFIG MCP-OEM CPUSYS-VM --outfile @out_file --chipset LANAI --hash --signing-mode TEST --sign --flavor asic -vv
